item.description:
Check our website for the updated speaker schedule. www.newengladreia.com


The Best Western Hotel
187 Chelsmford St.
Cheslmford, MA 01824
When: Wednesday, February 3rd, 2010, 6:30-10:00 PM
Admission Fees

Guests: $20.00 at the Door
NEREIA and Associated REIA Members: FREE

Ask about getting YOUR membership today!
item.how_to_find_us: Walk into the front of the building, and straight ahead you will see our Welcome table.
item.why: We welcome people from all walks of the real estate industry. If you are a first time investor or have been investing for years, we provide the education, networking and support that you need to grow your real estate business.

group.name: New England Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: New England Real Estate Investors Association Monthly Meetup
